newsitem.title: UK: Princess Diana in scuffle over gym photos.
newsitem.headline: Princess Diana in scuffle over gym photos.

text.p: Britain's Princess Diana was caught up in a street scuffle after reportedly asking a passer-by to snatch film of her from a photographer's camera.

The Sun newspaper on Tuesday carried three pages of pictures showing Diana, wearing a long black coat and trainers, first remonstrating with a photographer and then standing by as another man thrust him against a brick wall.
The Sun said Diana, the world's most photographed woman, had turned on the cameraman after he snapped her leaving a gym in London on Monday and demanded that he hand over the film.
Diana is shown talking to a stranger, who asked if she needed help, and then standing aside as the two men fought in the public street over the camera.
Police confirmed a confrontation had taken place but said no complaint had been made and it was not investigating the matter.
Photographer Brendan Beirne told the Sun; "I am stunned she (Diana) did not step in and stop it. It was outrageous.
"She knows I am not a stalker or a threat. I have taken photographs of her for 10 years."

Diana has cut down drastically on public appearances since her divorce last August from heir to the throne Prince Charles. Last year she succeeded in getting a court order against another freelance photogapher whom she accused of harassment.
